content: Our overall ROI or revenue from recommendation services, advertising and marketing services divided by the corresponding cost of acquisition and promotion, improved by 12 percentage points year-over-year in the third quarter and 6 percentage points year-over-year in the first nine months of 2022. Revenues from advertising and marketing services and other services increased by 66% to RMB32.2 million in the third quarter of 2022 from RMB19.4 million in the same period of 2021, primarily due to the growth of insurance brokerage services and other new business initiatives. As we continued excluding our cost optimization initiatives, our R&D expenses and G&A expenses decreased by 11.2% and 41.6% respectively in the third quarter of 2022, compared with the same period of 2021.
